title: Mouse click on link should select link
description: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the appropriate action is executed but the clicked link is not selected when returning to the welcome page. It would be helpful if links were selected when clicked to provide more context to the user upon returning to the welcome page.
OB: Open the application and go to the welcome page. Click on any link in the welcome page.
EB: After clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link should be selected when returning to the welcome page.
SR: Verify that after clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link is selected when returning to the welcome page.
